Posts.Content: hi i,m 32 and recently had a mammogram which i had to have every 12 months for the last 3 years due to family history , they called me back last week for another mammogam and an ultrasound as something showed up , i ended up having a ultasound and biopsy the same day as they've found something , i find out my results on thursday im going out of my mind with worry as this has came as a complete shock , has anyone any advice please, thank you x
Posts.Title: breast biopsy
